(Simplified: 鹧)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 庶 indicates the sound; 鳥 (bird) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 庶 [ shù ] numerous, various; multitude
    • 鳥 [ niǎo ] bird
①(鷓鴣)鳥，背部和腹部黑白兩色相雜，雄的有翅，雌的無翅。喫昆蟲、蚯蚓、植物的種子。棲息於生有灌叢和疏樹的山地。
鷓鴣 [ zhè gū ]: partridge
(Simplified: 鹧)

鷓字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷓； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1498第33
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?之夜切，音柘。鳥名。鷓鴣，越雉也。【禽經】隨陽鳥也。【崔豹·古今注】鷓鴣出南方，向日而飛，畏霜露，早晚希出。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鹧; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1498 Page 33
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Night cut, Yinzhe. The name of the bird. Partridge, more pheasant. [Qing Jing] Suiyang birds are also. [Cui Bao·Annotation from Ancient to Modern] Partridges go out to the south and fly toward the sun, fearing frost and dew, and hope to emerge sooner or later.
